title: Interact with Data on SurveyCTO
text: rsurveycto uses SurveyCTO’s API read write data datasets forms SurveyCTO server.

title: Interact with Data on SurveyCTO
Interact with Data on SurveyCTO
text: See reference documentation.

what: Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
title: Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
text: empty column one whose values NA "".

title: Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
text: d data.table.

title: Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
text: d modified reference, invisibly.

title: Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
code: library('data.table') d = data.table(w = 3:4, x = c('', 'foo'), y = c(NA, NA), z = c(NA, '')) drop_empties(d) #>    w   x #> 1: 3     #> 2: 4 foo

what: Get a SurveyCTO authentication session object — scto_auth
title: Get a SurveyCTO authentication session object — scto_auth
text: Authenticates SurveyCTO fetches corresponding credentials.

title: Get a SurveyCTO authentication session object — scto_auth
code: scto_auth(   auth_file = NULL,   servername = NULL,   username = NULL,   password = NULL )

title: Get a SurveyCTO authentication session object — scto_auth
text: auth_file String indicating path file containing authorization information, servername first line, username second, password third. auth_file NULL, arguments ignored. auth_file NULL, arguments must provided. servername String indicating name SurveyCTO server. username String indicating username SurveyCTO account. password String indicating password SurveyCTO account.

title: Get a SurveyCTO authentication session object — scto_auth
text: scto_auth object authenticated SurveyCTO session.

title: Get a SurveyCTO authentication session object — scto_auth
code: if (FALSE) { # preferred approach, avoids storing any credentials in code auth = scto_auth('scto_auth.txt')  # alternate approach auth = scto_auth('my_server', 'my_user', 'my_pw', auth_file = NULL) }

what: Download file attachments from a SurveyCTO form — scto_get_attachments
title: Download file attachments from a SurveyCTO form — scto_get_attachments
text: function downloads files bulk.

title: Download file attachments from a SurveyCTO form — scto_get_attachments
code: scto_get_attachments(   auth,   urls,   output_dir = "scto_data",   private_key = NULL,   overwrite = TRUE )

title: Download file attachments from a SurveyCTO form — scto_get_attachments
text: auth scto_auth() object. urls Character vector API URLs file attachments. typically derived column data.table returned scto_read(). Can contain missing values. output_dir String indicating path directory save files. private_key String indicating path private key file. needs non-NULL decrypt encrypted file attachments. overwrite Logical indicating whether overwrite existing files.

title: Download file attachments from a SurveyCTO form — scto_get_attachments
text: character vector file names length urls, NA missing invalid URLs.

title: Download file attachments from a SurveyCTO form — scto_get_attachments
code: if (FALSE) { auth = scto_auth('scto_auth.txt') scto_data = scto_read(auth, 'my_form', 'form') filenames = scto_get_attachments(auth, scto_data[['my_attachment']]) }

what: Access SurveyCTO data using the API — scto_read
title: Access SurveyCTO data using the API — scto_read
text: function reads data SurveyCTO using API.

title: Access SurveyCTO data using the API — scto_read
code: scto_read(   auth,   id,   type = c("dataset", "form"),   start_date = "1900-01-01",   review_status = "approved",   private_key = NULL,   drop_empty_cols = TRUE,   convert_datetime = c("CompletionDate", "SubmissionDate", "starttime", "endtime"),   datetime_format = "%b %e, %Y %I:%M:%S %p",   refresh = TRUE,   cache_dir = "scto_data" )

title: Access SurveyCTO data using the API — scto_read
text: auth scto_auth() object. id String indicating ID resource fetch. type String indicating whether resource dataset form. start_date Date-time something coercible date-time indicating earliest date-time fetch data. used forms. review_status String character vector indicating submissions fetch. Possible values "approved", "pending", "rejected", combination three. used forms. private_key String indicating path private key file. needs non-NULL read encrypted form data. drop_empty_cols Logical indicating whether drop columns contain NA empty string. convert_datetime Character vector column names data convert strings datetimes (POSIXct). Use NULL convert columns datetimes. datetime_format String indicating format datetimes SurveyCTO. See strptime(). refresh Logical indicating whether fetch fresh data using API attempt load locally cached data. cache_dir String indicating path directory cache data.

title: Access SurveyCTO data using the API — scto_read
text: data.table.

title: Access SurveyCTO data using the API — scto_read
Upload data to SurveyCTO — scto_write
text: function uploads data SurveyCTO using web POSTs GETs replace existing dataset.

title: Upload data to SurveyCTO — scto_write
Upload data to SurveyCTO — scto_write
text: auth scto_auth() object. data data.frame upload. dataset_id String indicating ID existing dataset. dataset_title String indicating title dataset.

title: Upload data to SurveyCTO — scto_write
text: object class httr::response().

title: Upload data to SurveyCTO — scto_write
code: if (FALSE) { auth = scto_auth('scto_auth.txt') res = scto_write(auth, data, 'my_dataset', 'My Dataset') }
